sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Goldman Sachs Group has lost about 8.8% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Merck & Co. ( MRK ), trading down 0.4%.
Merck & Co. is showing a gain of 18.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.3%, and Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
